Description:
Fans of professional car racing come to know and follow the championship by racing version of the NASCAR
Sprint Cup Series Championship. And in the game you will find all the official tracks of the championship
and the full composition of the participating teams with all the riders, as well as an impressive array of
racing cars of the sixth generation with enormous possibilities for customization of appearance,
starting with the decals and finishing painting.
